message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's worth discussing the price, and I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. What do you think?
I'm getting closer to what I'm comfortable with, but I still need to save some money. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.

I'm willing to meet you at $950000, but I'm still not getting the price I want. I'm willing to compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $1000000. This is my final offer, so I'd appreciate it if you could consider it carefully.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product.

I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not convinced that $975000 is fair. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $975000 and $1000000, so I'm counteroffering at $987500. This is my last offer before considering other options.
I understand you're trying to get a good price, but I'm not willing to go above $975000. I'm sticking with my previous offer.

I'm not willing to accept $975000, as it's below my minimum price. I'm willing to make one last offer at $990000, which is still a compromise. If this isn't acceptable, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go above $975000. I'm willing to accept your product at this price.
